name: EDUCAUSE
description: nonprofit association to advance higher education through use of information technology
sampleDescriptions: Support for HR 1772, the Accessible Instructional Materials in Higher Education Act, and clarification of the differences in the Senate companion bill, S.2138; concerns with Department of Education's
Concerns with the Obama administrations final rule updating the white collar exemptions to federal overtime rules (RIN 1235-AA11); support for DOL Request for Information on Overtime (RIN 1235-AA20).
